definition: any of numerous marine mammals that come on shore to breed, decide irrevocably
details:
noun
- any of numerous marine mammals that come on shore to breed
- a device incised to make an impression
= synonyms: stamp
- fastener that provides a tight and perfect closure
- a finishing coat applied to exclude moisture
- fastener consisting of a resinous composition that is plastic when warm
= example: fastener consisting of a resinous composition that is plastic when warm
- an indication of approved or superior status
= synonyms: cachet, seal of approval
- a stamp affixed to a document (as to attest to its authenticity or to seal it)
= example: a stamp affixed to a document (as to attest to its authenticity or to seal it)
- the pelt or fur (especially the underfur) of a seal
= example: the pelt or fur (especially the underfur) of a seal
= synonyms: sealskin
verb
- decide irrevocably
= example: decide irrevocably
- hunt seals
- cover with varnish
= synonyms: varnish
- close with or as if with a seal
= example: close with or as if with a seal
- make tight
= synonyms: seal off
- affix a seal to
= example: affix a seal to
